channel.title: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...
channel.description:
... for our kind benfactors at Valve have put together some kind advice for us
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=w5I3VnCHWsU']Valentine's Gift Buying[/url]

item.title: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I thought the GIF was at a superb length, myself. I laughed myself silly, but then remembered I got the equivalent of that one December before a finals test from a girl I liked at the time. I stopped laughing.

Read full topic

item.title: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...
item.dc:creator: DrasarSalman
item.description:
… what if the car was from the future, and was being driven by Raminators great great great grandson, and he had a sudden urge to jump the car. So here is the car flying through the air, the girl getting flipped off. It suddenly lands ontop of her face and he catches on fire

What if it was Ram’s granddaughter? What if the car was from a parallel universe? What if it was a spaceship from another planet? What if it was a boat? What if it was a crashing airplane? What if it was more vehicles?

It is too much variables :aah:

Read full topic
item.source: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...

item.title: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
… what if the car was from the future, and was being driven by Raminators great great great grandson, and he had a sudden urge to jump the car. So here is the car flying through the air, the guy flipping off his ex gf. It suddenly lands ontop of his face and she catches on fire.

I think we have a plot twist here :awesome:

Read full topic
item.source: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...

item.title: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...
item.dc:creator: DrasarSalman
item.description:
What if it hit her, spun out, and hits him?
What if it misses him and hits her?
What if it misses her and hits him?

What if it is a car from Soviet Russia?
Will she hit the car, spin out, and hit him? Or will he hit the car, spin out, and hit her? What if the car, the girl, and the guy hit each other? What if karma existed? What if the girl, the car, or the guy suddenly ran away leaving the two remaining in a horrible collision?

We need a decent epilogue!

Read full topic
item.source: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...

item.title: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...

item.description:
Hell, what if it hit him, spun out, and hit her? There, now we can all be happy.

item.title: Valentine's not going so well? Fear not...
item.dc:creator: JayJay
item.description:
Aze:

^this
Valentines day is nothing but another day invented by ppl who want you to spend money =/
I think every day is “valentines day” for someone who’s in love

It actually started thanks to St. Valentine a few thousand years ago. Its not like it sprang up recently as an idea to get us to spend more money.
